editor.label: Resource - @PLUGIN_KEY@ Create
editor.description: Create virtual machines on the ESX server. Guest OS installation must be performed by the user.

formElement.label: ESX Connection:
formElement.documentation: The name of the configuration which holds the connection information for ESX server.

formElement.label: VM Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the virtual machine to be created.

formElement.label: Datastore:
formElement.documentation: Name of the datastore. Default: Any accessible datastore with free space greater than the disksize specified.

formElement.label: Disk size (in KB):
formElement.documentation: Capacity of the virtual disk in KB (default is 4096).

formElement.label: Memory size:
formElement.documentation: Size of virtual machine's memory in MB (default is 256)

formElement.label: Number of CPUs:
formElement.documentation: Number of virtual processors in a virtual machine (default is 1).

formElement.label: Network Name:
formElement.documentation: Network name. Default: Any accessible network.

formElement.label: Connect Network at Power On?:
formElement.documentation: Flag to specify whether or not to connect the device when the virtual machine starts (default is false).

formElement.label: Power On Vm?:
formElement.documentation: Flag to specify whether or not to power on the created virtual machine(s) (default is false).

formElement.label: Number of VMs:
formElement.documentation: Number of virtual machines to create (default is 1). If the value is greater than 1, a suffix is added to VM names. The suffix consists of an underscore and the VM number ('_#').

formElement.label: JobStep Timeout:
formElement.documentation: Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
